1499910.name: Sacrifice Your Friends Soundtrack
1499910.description:
“From the Mountain tops to the Rancid Docks, from the Desert Dunes to the Icy Rocks”. Sheiks and Flappers will dance their way to the greatest Sacrifice of all time.
Inspired by the popular music of the beginning of the XXth century, this Original Soundtrack composed by Habib Zekri will make you lose your sanity in its maddening rhythms: Manouche, Big Band, Jazz and Avant-Garde, you name it!
“Sacrifice Your Friends ‘till it drives you nuts, sacrifice ‘em all if you have the guts” sings the bewildering voice of Maisy Kay on the Theme Song of SYF...Will you?
